Sorry.

::DarkMouse::

The autoguns opened fire on the Maximals as they enterd the bridge.
She took a shot in the side and jumped over the console and drew her 
gun.  She fired on the Maximal.  
"Computer, open cannons on the Maximal signatures."

The bridge cannons fired on the maximals.

She ducked behind a panel.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, TrikeJacob@n... wrote:
> Its DinoTRON, logomorph. Not DinoBOT. 
> Stegotron and Dinotron were running down the hall, when all of a 
sudden the  hall autoguns began fireing on them. They ducked and 
crawled past the autoguns. Dinotron fired his optic blasters a couple 
of times and dismantled one of them. They finally reached Triceradon 
and Ultracon who were pounding on the door.
> Stegotron: "Uh guys, Why don't you push the button to open the 
door? "
> "Oh." they said. They pushed the button and the door slid open. 
They burst in with all their guns a blazing.
